I track what windows you open. I don\'t track what you put in the windows. I track this so that I can make the app better. If I see that a lot of people spend a lot of time on a specific screen that means that I need to rearrange how the application is presented to you, the user. I try to make my applications for the users. If you want to disable this please click the check box below. This is a way for you to opt out.
